Now heritrix (again) works under Ubuntu 9.04!  I'm collecting many records =
into one arc file.  Next I must (again) confront my ignorance:  How do I re=
cover plaintext archived files?  I found http://crawler.archive.org/apidocs=
/org/archive/io/arc/ARCReader.html, but I don't yet comprehend how to go ab=
out extracting individual records from a collected archive.  Obviously one =
uses ARCReader for this.  I suspect I'm missing something obvious here - on=
ly not obvious to me, right now.  Could someone please enlighten me?

Rich =
B.
